Posts.Content: Apr 11, 2008 11:50PM uclarn29 wrote: Hello Janine, I too am beginning chemo on April 17. My first two meds I will start on are Adriamycin and Cytoxan every 2 weeks x 4 times, then I will move on to Taxol and Herceptin every week for 12 weeks, then Herceptin alone every 3 weeks for 9 months. I am veeerrryyy nervous about the whole thing and I joined this website to find somebody going through the same thing as I. I just had a modified radical mastecomy on my right breast and a power port placed on the left side of chest just yesterday. Everything seems to be moving so quickly and a lot of times I feel so lost? Well maybe we can go through this together...? What day do you begin chemo and what medications will be part of your treatment?
Posts.Title: chemo in april 2008 janineloveya38 otter

Posts.Content: Apr 12, 2008 09:20AM uclarn29 wrote: Thai, Did you feel something immedietely after the AC or did it take awhile? I was prescribed Emend and Neulasta before Chemo and zofran and compazine for nausea after the chemo. How come you are getting the Neulasta after chemo?  I am getting chemo anxiety because I am starting on thursday. please write back, jen
